segments.text: I'm looking closely at the details of this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The simple cabinet doors, the pulled-back curtains â€“ it's a normal home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then you notice the fine stream of water, glistening, as it overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water on the floor is quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost artistic how it reflects the light, despite the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids are like little conspirators, so focused on their target.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's face is hidden, but you can feel his determination to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the girl holds out her hand is just priceless; pure anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper playing out right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself smiling at their ingenuity and shared goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit naughty, but also quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Of course, the unstable stool gives me pause.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But for a moment, it's just about the forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR
